com.bandyer.core_av.capturer

Class CapturerAV

  • AbstractBaseCapturer
    • com.bandyer.core_av.capturer.CapturerAV
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AudioInterface<T>, CapturerObserver, VideoInterface<T>

    public class CapturerAV
extends AbstractBaseCapturer
implements VideoInterface<T>, AudioInterface<T>, CapturerObserver

    This class captures device audio and video from the camera It will follow the activity lifecycle, so you don't need to pause/resume/destroy

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.bandyer.core_av.capturer.video.VideoInterface

        VideoInterface.DefaultImpls

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CapturerAV(android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity context)
      This class captures device audio and video from the camera It will follow the activity lifecycle, so you don't need to pause/resume/destroy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroyCapturer() 
      CapturerQuality getBestCaptureFormat(android.content.Context context, CameraVideoFeeder feeder)
      Method to request the best capture format that your device camera can support related to our supported aspect-ratio. You may want to render with a higher quality then our default (we don't recommend it)
      CameraVideoFeeder getFeeder()
      Used to indicate the current camera feeder
      CapturerQuality getNearestCaptureQualitySupported(android.content.Context context, CapturerQuality desiredQualityCapturer)
      Method to request the nearest capture quality that your device camera can support related to our supported aspect-ratio. The nearest capturing quality will be decided based on the width or height
      java.util.List<com.bandyer.core_av.capturer.video.CapturerQuality> getSupportedCaptureQualityList(android.content.Context context, CameraVideoFeeder feeder)
      Method to request the list of capture quality that are supported by your feeder provided related to our supported aspect-ratio.
      boolean isAudioEnabled()
      Used to indicate if audio is enabled or not.
      boolean isVideoEnabled()
      Used to indicate if video is enabled or not.

      Called on main thread when an error has occurred
      void onCaptureStarted(Stream stream)
      Called on main thread when capturer started
      void onCapturerInterrupted()
      Called on main thread when the capturer has been interrupted forcibly

      void resumeCapturer() 
      CapturerAV setAudioEnabled(boolean enable)
      Method used to enable/disable the audio channel
      CapturerAV setMaxVideoOutputQuality(CapturerQuality outputQualityCapturer)
      Set the max video output quality to be streamed Be aware that this is the max output that will be streamed and not the actual value that will be received by the other parts

      Method to enable the video

      • getBestCaptureFormat

        public CapturerQuality getBestCaptureFormat(android.content.Context context,
                                            CameraVideoFeeder feeder)

        Method to request the best capture format that your device camera can support related to our supported aspect-ratio. You may want to render with a higher quality then our default (we don't recommend it)

        Parameters:
        context - Context
        feeder - The feeder for which to request the best capturing supported quality
        Returns:
        the best capturing quality supported for the feeder

      • getNearestCaptureQualitySupported

        public CapturerQuality getNearestCaptureQualitySupported(android.content.Context context,
                                                         CapturerQuality desiredQualityCapturer)

        Method to request the nearest capture quality that your device camera can support related to our supported aspect-ratio. The nearest capturing quality will be decided based on the width or height

        Parameters:
        context - Context
        desiredQualityCapturer - Context
        Returns:
        the nearest capturing quality supported for the current feeder

      • getSupportedCaptureQualityList

        public java.util.List<com.bandyer.core_av.capturer.video.CapturerQuality> getSupportedCaptureQualityList(android.content.Context context,
                                                                                                         CameraVideoFeeder feeder)

        Method to request the list of capture quality that are supported by your feeder provided related to our supported aspect-ratio.

        Parameters:
        context -
        feeder - Feeder desired
        Returns:
        the list of qualities supported
